hero.title: Create Unlimited Digital Product Passports
hero.subtitle: Free, open-source platform for EU Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation (ESPR) compliance. Generate machine-readable passports with QR codes for batteries, textiles, construction products, and 12+ categories. Self-host on your own servers or use our hosted version.

features.title: Everything You Need for Compliance
features.subtitle: Built following EU technical standards: decentralized storage, ISO 15459 identifiers, tiered access rights, and machine-readable JSON/XML output.

espr.title: ESPR Compliant
espr.description: Pre-configured templates following EU Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation requirements per category.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Fully open source. Self-host on your own servers for complete data control, or use our hosted version for free.

machineReadable.title: Machine-Readable
machineReadable.description: Not static PDFs. Structured JSON/XML data for integration with BIM, recycling systems, and other software.

qr.title: QR & Data Carriers
qr.description: Each passport gets a unique URL and QR code. Ready for NFC/RFID integration per ISO 15459.

ai.title: Autofill with AI
ai.subtitle: Stop typing manually. Upload a photo of your product label or any document, and our AI extracts all the data automatically in seconds.

categories.title: Supported Product Categories
categories.subtitle: Templates built from official EU regulations and delegated acts. Active regulations are in effect, Priority groups have templates ready for upcoming requirements.

timeline.title: EU DPP Implementation Deadlines
timeline.subtitle: The EU is rolling out Digital Product Passport requirements in phases. Start preparing now to ensure compliance.

feb2027.title: February 2027
feb2027.description: EV, industrial, and LMT batteries must have Digital Product Passports with full lifecycle data, carbon footprint declarations (kg COâ‚‚e/kWh with Class A-D rating), and recycled content percentages for cobalt, lithium, and nickel.

active.title: Active Now
active.description: Construction Products (EU 2024/3110), Wine & Spirits (EU 2021/2117), and Toys (EU 2025/2509) already require digital declarations. Templates available now.

rollout.title: 2027-2030: Full Rollout
rollout.description: Textiles, electronics, furniture, iron/steel, aluminum, cosmetics, tires, and detergents will require DPPs as delegated acts are published. Priority group templates ready now.

selfHost.title: Run It On Your Own Servers
selfHost.subtitle: This project is fully open source. You can self-host on your own infrastructure for complete data sovereignty, modify the code to fit your needs, or contribute to the project.
